mainTask.title: HT-029: Dynamic Template Engine & Client App Generation MVP
mainTask.description:
DYNAMIC TEMPLATE ENGINE MVP: Build foundational template engine system with dynamic client app generation, landing page + questionnaire + PDF consultation workflow for agency custom micro-app toolkit.

**Mission:** Create a practical template engine that enables rapid generation of custom client micro-apps with landing page → questionnaire → free consultation document workflow for ≤7-day delivery capability using AI assistance.

**Scope:** Template engine core infrastructure, dynamic page generation system, MVP template implementation (consultation workflow), component injection system, and template-to-app generation pipeline.

**Methodology:** AUDIT → DECIDE → APPLY → VERIFY with 12+ template engine verification checkpoints, end-to-end client app generation testing, and template system validation.

**Business Impact:**
- Enable dynamic custom micro-app generation from templates
- Reduce client app creation time from weeks to hours
- Provide standardized consultation workflow template
- Create scalable template system foundation for agency growth
- Enable AI-assisted template customization and deployment

success_metrics.deployment_integration: Seamless integration with existing deployment pipeline

subtasks.title: Phase 1: Template Architecture & MVP Design
subtasks.description: AUDIT & DECIDE: Design template engine architecture with MVP template specification, dynamic generation strategy, and component mapping system.

actions.title: Template System Architecture Analysis & Requirements
actions.description: Analyze template system requirements and design foundational architecture with template storage, compilation engine, and generation pipeline
verification_checkpoints: Template system requirements analyzed and documented
Template engine architecture designed and validated
Template engine dashboard created and functional

actions.title: MVP Template Specification Design (Landing + Questionnaire + PDF)
actions.description: Design MVP template specification for consultation workflow with landing page, questionnaire flow, and PDF consultation generation
verification_checkpoints: MVP template specification designed and documented
Template management interface created and functional

actions.title: Dynamic Page Generation Strategy & Component Mapping
actions.description: Design dynamic page generation strategy with component mapping system, route generation, and template-to-component injection

actions.title: Template Configuration Schema & Data Flow Design
actions.description: Design template configuration schema with data flow architecture, template variables system, and customization framework
verification_checkpoints: Template configuration schema designed and validated

subtasks.title: Phase 2: Template Engine Core & Dynamic Generation
subtasks.description: APPLY: Implement template engine core infrastructure with dynamic route generation, component injection system, and template configuration loader.

actions.title: Template Engine Core Infrastructure Development
actions.description: Implement template engine core infrastructure with template compilation, generation pipeline, and template management system
verification_checkpoints: Template engine core interface created and functional

actions.title: Dynamic Route Generation System Implementation
actions.description: Implement dynamic route generation system with template-based routing, URL generation, and navigation system

actions.title: Component Injection & Template Renderer Development
actions.description: Implement component injection system and template renderer with dynamic component loading, template rendering, and component mapping

actions.title: Template Configuration Loader & Parser Implementation
actions.description: Implement template configuration loader and parser with JSON configuration processing, validation, and template instantiation

subtasks.title: Phase 3: MVP Template Implementation & Integration
subtasks.description: APPLY: Implement MVP template with landing page, questionnaire system, PDF generation, and template customization interface.

actions.title: MVP Template Pages Creation (Landing, Questionnaire, Results)
actions.description: Create MVP template pages with landing page template, questionnaire flow, and consultation results page
verification_checkpoints: MVP landing page template created and functional

actions.title: Questionnaire Builder Integration & PDF Generation
actions.description: Integrate questionnaire builder with template system and implement PDF consultation generation with document templates
verification_checkpoints: Questionnaire builder integrated with template system
Questionnaire integration interface created and functional

actions.title: Template Customization Interface & Theme Application
actions.description: Implement template customization interface with theme application, content editing, and template personalization

actions.title: Client App Generation Pipeline & Deployment Integration
actions.description: Implement client app generation pipeline with deployment integration, app packaging, and automated deployment
verification_checkpoints: Generation pipeline interface created and functional

subtasks.title: Phase 4: Template System Testing & Validation
subtasks.description: VERIFY: Implement comprehensive template system testing with end-to-end workflow validation, performance optimization, and system documentation.

actions.title: Template Engine Testing & Component Validation
actions.description: Implement comprehensive template engine testing with component validation, template compilation testing, and generation pipeline validation

actions.title: End-to-End Client App Generation Workflow Testing
actions.description: Implement end-to-end workflow testing with complete client app generation, deployment testing, and workflow validation
verification_checkpoints: Complete client app generation testing working
Workflow testing interface created and functional

actions.title: Performance Optimization & Template Loading Speed
actions.description: Implement performance optimization with template loading speed optimization, compilation performance, and generation speed improvements

actions.title: Template System Documentation & Completion Verification
actions.description: Complete template system documentation with usage guides, API documentation, and template creation guides

phase_1.focus: Template engine architecture and MVP design

phase_2.focus: Template engine core and dynamic generation implementation

critical_checkpoints: MVP template pages created and functional

success_criteria.template_engine_reliability: 95% template compilation success rate with automated error handling
success_criteria.app_generation_speed: ≤2 minutes complete client app generation time
success_criteria.template_flexibility: Support for 3+ template variations with customization
success_criteria.deployment_integration: Seamless integration with existing deployment pipeline
success_criteria.customization_capability: Complete theme and content customization support

technical_risks: Dynamic component injection complexity may introduce rendering issues
Template compilation performance may impact user experience
Component mapping system may be fragile with complex templates
Integration with existing systems may require significant refactoring
mitigation_strategies: Comprehensive component testing with fallback rendering
Performance optimization with caching and lazy loading
Robust component mapping with error handling and validation
Gradual integration approach with backwards compatibility
